[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/27426510/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/27426510)

Coverage increased (+0.04%) to 50.529% when pulling **5257ca1b49d2a36a2c1842a9ffa76a38a8185241 on ssssssnake:develop** into **44569e4df6620fff61e43d782815f93a97e748ea on apache:develop**.

> 查看是否有消费超时发生（会有重试消息）

存在重试消息，但是消费者还是不能正常消费，一直卡在产生重试消息的那个时间点
@gilbertguan2385 4.5 release is not finishing. @wlliqipeng
LGTM

@beijixiongzzj 在网络出现问题或者是系统抖动的情况下确实有可能导致这些情况，所以rocketmq客户端有定时获取元数据做rebalance的机制，而且出现上述问题后，最大的可能在于重复消息，而不会丢失消息，我们认为这个是可以接受的，感谢评论，如果有诸如此类的咨询问题的话麻烦在我们的邮件列表里面讨论：https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/，issue用于feature request 以及bug report。
@beijixiongzzj 这一块的确可以优化，但是反向复制的话会增加系统的复杂度，当然，拷贝位点文件也是个不错的做法，如果这块有想法的话，可以在邮件列表里面发起一个讨论：https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/，很多小伙伴会一期参与讨论的。
@vacheli 具体的可以看下日志，看下客户端的rebalance的日志同时结合消息的borntime以及storetime进行排查，咨询的话尽量在邮件列表发起讨论：https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/，会有很多小伙伴帮助解答的。

> @scruel Great Patch!But can you add some test case codes for your PR's codes?

I am sorry to reply so late, and have to say that I am too busy to write the test case codes...
I will fill out those test block soon when I have time.
我后来又仔细想了一下，这个问题的解决之道，在于运维方式，应该是在master上线前，将这个节点下的所有slave全部下线，脱离集群后，从所有slave中找到一个最大的offset然后，将offset文件手工覆盖到master的offset文件后再将所有的broker重启加入到namesrv中。我觉得像这样的问题必须在官网上重点指明，不然一些生产环境出现这些问题的用户会有损失

遇到过类似的问题，建议你shutdown程序的时候，不要用kill -9，要执行consumer.shutdown()。这样才会注销掉对MessageQueue的分配，服务端默认MessageQueue占有时间是1分钟，所以你会遇到重启一段时间不能消费，其实是在重平衡。  而且官方建议用英文描述你的问题。
4.3.0客户端修改了自动创建Topic所需要的内置Topic，所以默认4.3.0版本自动创建跟其它版本的broker会不兼容
@davidpdw 只有4.3才会出现这个不兼容的问题么？ 后期版本是否已经修复了这个问题？
@3EDCKenneth 4.3.1后将改动回退了，所以就4.3.0会有自动创建Topic版本不兼容

@davidpdw 因为现在生产上已经在用4.3.0客户端和4.3.0服务端，如果我升级服务端可能有些系统不能用了，有没有方法避免，或者让其他系统先升级到4.3.1客户端后我再升级服务端，这样客户端版本比服务端高可以兼容吗？
非常感谢反馈，如果有咨询类的问题的话麻烦在开发者群里或者我们的邮件列表里面讨论：https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/  ,issue用于feature request 以及bug report。
最简单方法建议使用手动创建Topic，目前自动创建Topic在特殊情况下会只创建在一个分片上，影响高可用。
看消费线程是否一直block住了，如果有一条消息，消费没有返回，就会导致消费offset不会前进

> 看消费线程是否一直block住了，如果有一条消息，消费没有返回，就会导致消费offset不会前进

怎么才能避免这种情况
I think it's a bug. Someone has already submitted a [PR](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/1083), but it has not been accepted.

chenld您好，请问下有解决上面问题吗，现在用rocketmq双主双从，经常出现org.apache.rocketmq.remoting.exception.RemotingTimeoutException: wait response on the channel <10.111.xxx.xxx:10911> timeout, 3000(ms)
zhanguohuang您好，请问下有解决上面问题吗，现在用rocketmq双主双从，经常出现org.apache.rocketmq.remoting.exception.RemotingTimeoutException: wait response on the channel <10.111.xxx.xxx:10911> timeout, 3000(ms)

如果你确认问题跟我描述的完全一样，就可以参考以下两种方案：
1.调整slave中的参数haSendHeartbeatInterval从5000调到4000，master不需要改，用mqadmin updateBrokerConfig即可，不需要重启(推荐使用此方案)
2.查看我提的pr #1083 ，需求修改源码打包部署到slave机器上，而且需要重启。 @chengqipeng 

补充：我提的另一个issue也会导致你说的这个问题 #1108 ，及它的解决方案 #1109

我是4.4的最新版本，WIN10下，依然运行官方例子，报这个错误，以前都启动NAMESERVER,和BROKER成功了，为什么呢？

也已经用了：
mqbroker.exe -n localhost:9876 autoCreateTopicEnable=true

>  @davidpdw  根据我的测试结果，我发现应该是主从同步slave使用FileChannel.position(offset)标记位置的时候，同时slave节点执行刷盘flush(false)，然后导致position调用阻塞，进而影响到了master节点主从同步阻塞引起的

能不能问下 你是如何测试的? 我在调试时只能debug, 但是定位不了特别具体的耗时步骤.

> @mm23504570  
> 8 CPU. 48G MEM. SSD disk
> I set vm.min_free_kbytes = 1000000 and resolved the problem.

问下, 你这里的总计内存48G, 设置了 vm.min_free_kbytes=1G; 这样的考虑是什么? 设置后的对系统/RMQ的预期影响是什么?
@icersummer 我只是添加了打印耗时代码，然后重新编译了测试的

When you put forward a issue about rocketmq,please follow the issue's format! @anutaisland
I have alreay put forward a issue.The issue's link is:https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/issues/1147! You can see this one.
It is better, IMO, to discuss these kinds of question about the code in the [develop mail list](http://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact).

You should use admin tools to create the same topic on the new broker3 and broker4, and then the topic router will be updated in the name server.
And more, it is better, IMO, to discuss these kinds of question about the code in the [develop mail list](http://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/).

@ShannonDing Thanks to Mr. Ding's answer, this issue is that I saw the rocketmq topic creation mechanism, and some thoughts were drawn. I also wrote an article specifically: https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/aMmLiMkt82S729BIp8B75Q
I hope that rocketmq is getting better and better!

DLedger is based on raft protocol, there is a class DLedgerLeaderElector which is used to select leader.And will notice broker role changed.
But i have a question which rocketmq version can support leader priority selection. @dongeforever

for slave broker:
CommitLog.appendData(long startOffset, byte[] data) => MappFile.appendMessage(final byte[] data)
then
MappedFile.storeTimestamp is always 0 => MappedFileQueue's storeTimestamp is always 0
=> checkpoint's physicMsgTimestamp is always 0.

maybe in function MappFile.appendMessage(final byte[] data) ,   we can set storeTimestamp = Math.max(storeTimestamp,   System.currentTimeMillis() - 30 * 1000).   something like this ?

Hi @walking98,the plain_acl.yml file of rocketmq is a structure file,so users can use mqadmin API to config which acl attributes?And I think the accesskey represents a usename,it is a unique one.So,it can't be changed.So,we can dissucss which attributes can be changed?

Hi @zongtanghu 

```
accounts:
- accessKey: RocketMQ
  secretKey: 12345678
  whiteRemoteAddress: 192.168.0.*
  admin: false
  defaultTopicPerm: DENY
  defaultGroupPerm: SUB
  topicPerms:
  - topicA=DENY
  - topicB=PUB|SUB
  - topicC=SUB
  groupPerms:
  # the group should convert to retry topic
  - groupA=DENY
  - groupB=SUB
  - groupC=SUB
```

I feel the rmqadmin API can operate the following attributes remotely:
1.  Add/Remove  account (ak). ak is the unique key of an account, so it can not be changed but  the account can be removed.
2. Adjust whitelist/permit groups/permit topics for a specific account

**FEATURE REQUEST 2**

About HA

I understand the current ACL impl needs the plain-acl.yml keep an identical copy for each broker in a RMQ cluster. The rest of yml files in different brokers should sync into the same content if anyone (leader) file is changed.

It will be a challenge for a remote management tool (i.e. mqadmin) to perform this data consistent among these yml files.

So we need to consider the High Availability situation. How to decide leader yml file and how other files follow it if the file has any change.
@walking98 @duhenglucky The problem of HA is much more complex to design.We need a authority service to provide some api to outer system,such as broker component.So,we can discuss this topic deeply.

@walking98  As current acl design in rocketmq,I think the simple way to query and upate the acl configuration is adding the some parameters in the mqadmin command,such as broker ip and port.This way is the same as some mqadmin command for updating Broker Config,such as "sh mqadmin updateBrokerConfig -k connectTimeoutMillis -v 5000 -n XX.XX.XX.XX:9876 -b XX.XX.XX.XX:10911"

we can refer to the mqadmin updateTopic command implementation, which can support operate Topic in cluster level or individual broker level.  So seems the worry about HA is not necessary.
